scripts.upload-server: scp -i simple-websocket-server.pem server.js ec2-user@3.72.72.221:/home/ec2-user && ssh -i simple-websocket-server.pem ec2-user@3.72.72.221 'sudo systemctl restart websocket-server.service'
scripts.upload-client: aws s3 cp index.html s3://simple-socket-chat/ --profile ian
scripts.logs-time: ssh -i simple-websocket-server.pem ec2-user@3.72.72.221 'journalctl --since "5 minutes ago" -u websocket-server.service'
